A small group of dedicated individuals can create significant change, as highlighted by Margaret Mead. Jeff Weiner, CEO of LinkedIn, emphasizes the importance of focusing on fewer tasks done well, rather than trying to do everything. He encourages his team to prioritize quality communication and decision-making to lead effectively.

Essentialism applies not just to personal life but also to leadership in organizations. Through research involving over five hundred individuals from various teams, the author learned about the experiences of working in cohesive versus disjointed teams. Participants reflected on their managers' roles and the outcomes of their teamwork, revealing how unity and clarity can lead to success, while disunity can result in confusion and failure.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Leadership effectiveness is enhanced by focusing on fewer priorities to achieve better outcomes.
